com.radiotelescope.schedule

Class ControlRoomSimulator

  • com.radiotelescope.schedule.ControlRoomSimulator

  • public class ControlRoomSimulator

    Spring Component that acts as a simulator for the control room, handling all of the different stages of conducting an appointment. This will only be ran on the development server for now

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ControlRoomSimulator(IAppointmentRepository appointmentRepo, IRFDataRepository rfDataRepo, Profile profile)
      Spring Component that acts as a simulator for the control room, handling all of the different stages of conducting an appointment. This will only be ran on the development server for now

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void handleCompletedAppointments(java.util.List<com.radiotelescope.repository.appointment.Appointment> completedAppointments)

        Spring Component that acts as a simulator for the control room, handling all of the different stages of conducting an appointment. This will only be ran on the development server for now

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute()

        Handles the following four scenarios:

        1.) Fast-forwarding all appointments that are scheduled, but the end time has already passed 2.) Beginning all appointments that are scheduled, but now have a start time in the past 3.) Marking all in progress appointments as completed if the end time is now in the past 4.) Adding a new RF Data point for in progress appointments that still have end times in the future

        This method will run every minute, allowing for a simulated RF Data reading of once per minute for all in progress appointments.

      • handleStartingAppointments

        public void handleStartingAppointments(java.util.List<com.radiotelescope.repository.appointment.Appointment> startedAppointment)

        Handles "starting" all appointments that are marked scheduled and have a start time in the past. Sets the status for each to Appointment.Status.IN_PROGRESS

        Parameters:
        startedAppointment - all appointments with a start time in the past

      • handleCompletedAppointments

        public void handleCompletedAppointments(java.util.List<com.radiotelescope.repository.appointment.Appointment> completedAppointments)

        Handles "completing" all appointments that are in progress and now have a end time in the past. Sets the status for each to Appointment.Status.COMPLETED

        Parameters:
        completedAppointments - all in progress appointments that are now completed

      • handleInProgressAppointments

        public void handleInProgressAppointments(java.util.List<com.radiotelescope.repository.appointment.Appointment> inProgressAppointments)

        Adds a new RF Data point to all appointments that are still in progress

        Parameters:
        inProgressAppointments - all in progress appointments that are not yet completed
